rows.name: reply_zero
rows.value:
Great that this has been a good week!

We will remind you regularly to relax, recognise and reward yourself, to help you continue to manage your stress and feel calm.

rows.name: reply_less
rows.value:
Great that you felt calm most of the week! 

We will remind you regularly to relax, recognise and reward yourself, to help you continue to manage your stress and feel calm.

rows.name: reply_greater_equal
rows.value:
We understand how stressful life can be. We will remind you regularly to relax, recognise and reward yourself, to help manage your stress and feel calmer.

We will learn more about managing stress in week @data.workshop.w_stress.number of the @global.weekly_workshops - but you can already access some helpful tools under @data.parent_centre.my_tips.location_text to get you started!
